VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.NAME: Dimension Splitter: Aria
VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.FLAVOR: The engine imbued with otherworldly destruction.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b%d ( #b2 + #yUpgrade x3) damage to a random enemy. If #yFatal, repeats and gain [E] . NL It is upgraded whenever you enter the next Act. NL Current Upgrade: #b%d.
Space-based Weapon Preloading in Act 1... NL

VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.NAME: Cloyce's Determination
VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.FLAVOR: Even the undetermined may become otherwise. Determination can be caught like a flu.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRight #yClick: Take an extra turn after this turn, end your turn.（works #b%d times）

VUPShionMod:Croissant.NAME: Croissant
VUPShionMod:Croissant.FLAVOR: Such delicacy is utterly incompatible with the Spire.

VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.NAME: Sniperscope
VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.FLAVOR: Snipe for the weakness and deliver a critical blow.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to the enemy with the least HP. NL Enemies with #yVulnerable take #b75% more damage rather than #b50%.

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.NAME: Anastasia Droplet
VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.FLAVOR: Within which all the power beyond your wield is concentrated.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b200 Max HP. NL Gain #b200 #yBlock at the start of your turn. NL Start each combat with #yBarricade. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
NL ALL #yFunnels are upgraded by #b9. NL #yFunnels now hit ALL enemies. NL Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any #yPursued it has to a random enemy.
